bio.heading: Who is Cerine
description: Full-Stack developer with over 2 years of experience, I thrive on tackling challenges through innovative, scalable solutions. My expertise spans from front-end design (React, HTML, CSS, JS) to back-end development (Node.js, PHP, Laravel) and API integration.

Beyond development: I excel at communication and collaboration, effectively managing projects, teams, and even email campaigns (Mailchimp). I'm eager for the next challenge to leverage my full skillset and make a meaningful impact in the healthcare domain.

experience.title: Lead Full Stack Developer
experience.description: My passion for mentorship fuels my commitment to guide junior developers, sharing best practices and fostering a culture of continuous learning and growth. This combination of technical expertise and leadership enables me to lead successful projects and contribute meaningfully to any team.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: As a Full-Stack Developer at Thinline, I pride myself on crafting scalable solutions for diverse healthcare needs. I spearheaded the development of several platforms that empowered medical professionals and patients alike

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: With Netfer Smart Solutions, I led mobile app enhancements, injecting new features based on user feedback and market trends. Beyond development, I ensured seamless deployments (Git/Bitbucket/Docker) and tackled post-release bugs, enhancing software stability. My expertise extends to front-end development (HTML, CSS, JS), where I craft engaging visuals and drive website traffic. Passionate about backend performance, I leveraged Laravel to scale and secure existing projects.

capabilities.name: Figma
capabilities.description: Crafted user-friendly interfaces and interactive prototypes for healthcare platforms, ensuring optimal user experiences.

capabilities.name: JS
capabilities.description: Developed dynamic and responsive web applications using React, Node.js.

capabilities.name: PHP
capabilities.description: Built scalable and secure backend APIs for healthcare applications ensuring efficient data management and communication.

capabilities.name: MySQL
capabilities.description: Designed and managed robust databases to store and manage sensitive healthcare data, ensuring data integrity and security.
